sentence.Network_en: You would be well advised to tackle this problem urgently.
sentence.Network_cn: 你还是抓紧处理这个问题为好。

sentence.Network_en: Moderates believe the party would be well advised to talk to the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 温和派认为该政党的明智做法是去和政府谈判。

sentence.Network_en: Chris would have been well advised to heed the old saying "Never bite the hand that feeds you."
sentence.Network_cn: 克里斯本应听从那句老话——“千万不要恩将仇报”。

well done 做得不错 Well fed,well bred 吃得饱 well off 富裕的 well sinker 打井工 well then 那么 well up 涌出 well 好 well-advised 审慎的 well-.

she had been well-advised , now it's time to take a legal action against her .已经有人给她提供法律建议了，是时候对他采取法律行动了。

list.abs: You would be well - advised to book in advance ., 你还是提前预订较为稳妥.
You would be well - advised to stay at home today ., 今天你呆在家里才是上策.

more important , some people should avoid the products altogether . those with weakened immune systems or who are critically ill would be well advised to stay away from eating live bacteria .更要紧的是，一些人应该彻底避开这些产品：免疫系统虚弱的人或是患重病的人就建议不要吃活菌食品；

more important , some people should avoid the products altogether . those with weakened immune systems or who are critically ill would be well advised to stay away from eating live bacteria .更要紧的是，一些人应该彻底避开这些产品：免疫系统虚弱的人或是患重病的人就建议不要吃活菌食品；
You would be well advised to remain within the speed limit ., 您最好别超速行车.
